data.name: What Is Love? Anime Visual Novel Vol. 1
data.detailed_description:
Hello traveller! This game is still in development, so remember to add it to your wishlist if you want to get noticed about an amazing kawaii adventure WOW

Have you ever wondered What Is Love? But you probably got the whole idea wrong. And so do we! That's why we created this widely messed up game, full of weird ideas, wild choices, dangerous game paths, crazy (I mean c r a z y) plot twists where you can try to find an answer to this question by romancing beautiful girls who hide really dark secrets… Doing exactly what you always wanted to do, but you were too ashamed to admit it (unless you wanted to watch chicks fighting in jelly, then ... then hell yeah! You will find this in our game!)



Okay, so you are a high school student (how original!) and you meet pretty nice babes on your way. A sweet, joyful neighbour, an ice-cold schoolgirl, an hot young teacher or the cocky school president? Which one do you choose? Or maybe all of them at once? Calm down, nobody judges you (well actually, at the end of the chapter, there are collected statistics from the choices made, but chill… Do whatever you want!) Have fun, laugh, cry or ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°). Or do all of the above at the same time? We don't care. We want your money and your soul.
Just kidding
…or not? *evil laugh sound effect*







Sensei Asami:
"Life is too short not to learn. And love is something to learn"
A young, attractive teacher who tries to maintain maximum professionalism in contact with students. She loves reading romances and walking in the park. She always tries to help those students who need it. Oddly enough, however, she avoids eye contact with you …
Likes: teach the biology to her students
Dislikes: be on sick leave



Miyu:
"So you're my new neighbor? That's amazing!"
A sweet girl next door who loves to help everyone around. She is always smiling and has an aura of joy around her. She hangs out with school misfits and loves to cook Japanese delicacies at the soup kitchen volunteering club for those in need. You often see her doing some gardening work. You also often see a strange figure in the window of her upstairs room …
Likes: everything
Dislikes: nothing



Tsuneko:
"Our lives means nothing"
She is called an ice-cold princess at school, because she doesn't stay close to anyone and doesn't get attached to people. And indeed she is quite cold and distant, as well as she does not count on help from others. She also changed schools! Some may wonder why …
Likes: when no one bothers her
Dislikes: when someone bothers her



Emiko:
"Fine feathers make fine birds"
Queen bee. The school president, the most popular girl, the daughter of the local wealthy. She believes that nothing is as important as the image, which she cares for with commitment. You saw a picture of her parents in the local newspaper. Their smiles seem strangely fake to you …
Likes: her chauffeur who drives her to school in a limousine
Dislikes: walking long distances on foot



Jokes aside, it really does tho. So think carefully before you make any seemingly insignificant decision like: "Hey girl, sure I pick up the lipstick you dropped… BOOM you just killed the pope."* Okay, maybe we're exaggerating a bit, but your choices really do matter. Do you want to destroy these girls' lives, use their weaknesses and secrets to get into their panties, make them dependent, manipulate them and show them where they belong? Do you really want this? BIG OOF. But maybe you want to be a white knight who will free these girls from their past traumas and give them a bright new future, full of kindness, affection, devotion and warmth? Dude that's even more messed up. Oh well… I repeat, do whatever you want! Find your answer to the oldest question in the world!
Which came first: the chicken or the egg? Um, not this one. WHAT IS LOVE?
*This is not a real game situation, take it easy, no spoiler, pick up lipsticks for girls if you like.



  • Arts so beautiful that you can go blind (the developer of this game is not responsible for any injuries caused by playing)
  • Plot so wicked that you can poop yourself (saaaameee)
  • Four romanceable characters in development, beautiful girls, each with a completely different character and tits
  • Planned: 12 different endings so fricking amazing you would never have expected! (none of them includes the death of the pope tho)
  • Planned: Original great music that you will hum in the shower guaranteed or FULL REFUND*
    *As long as you send us a shower video where you don't hum it. No, seriously, there are no refunds, we are poor.
  • The egg. The egg was first.

data.short_description: What is Love you may ask... Love is a game. Pretty good one actually, full of pretty girls with dark secrets and everything you ever wanted. Love is in the air and you can breathe deeply. And do other stuff. Deeply. But have in mind that your actions matter so Baby, don't hurt me!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15.3
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Quad-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
- lewd jokes and dialogues
- girls fighting in a swimming pool
- bending sensei picking up a pen
- tragic accidents
- girls characters may get a little crazy
- suggestive sexual themes
Trigger Warnings:
- sexual assault
- death
- sizeism or fat shaming
- partial nudity
- medical issues
- divorce
